signals.problem_statement: The KSA team is struggling to manage a single shared inbox for all employee queries, leading to inefficiencies.
signals.customer_ask: We wanted to reduce this because same emails again and 19 people will read it out.
signals.context: Team of 19 managing a shared inbox for employee queries.

signals.problem_statement: There is a lack of a ticketing system to monitor SLAs and team performance for the KSA operations.
signals.customer_ask: We wanted to explore how ticketing system works and how we can able to monitor the SLAs and the team performance also through AI automation.
signals.context: Team of 19 managing a shared inbox for employee queries.

signals.problem_statement: The current email management process does not allow for effective categorization or prioritization of incoming requests.
signals.customer_ask: We can create a category, right?
signals.context: Team of 19 managing a shared inbox for employee queries.

signals.problem_statement: The existing system does not support automation for ticket assignment based on client-specific queries.
signals.customer_ask: Will the system pick the keywords which is in the mail body, the client name, and assign it by themselves?
signals.context: Team of 19 managing a shared inbox for employee queries.

signals.problem_statement: There is no integration with existing platforms like Monday.com for managing employee requests.
signals.customer_ask: Will that be possible? Whatever we are receiving in Monday.com, will that be converted here as a ticket?
signals.context: Team of 19 managing a shared inbox for employee queries.

signals.problem_statement: The current system lacks a customer portal for employees to submit requests, making it difficult to manage incoming queries efficiently.
signals.customer_ask: Is it possible to connect back on Friday for a quick feedback?
